fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
Factional night chat
Killings are exclusive, one must spawn, if it died any member may forgo their night action to visit
If Linchpins have majority without converting to Kingpin (post: 4129), they will all die
Linchpins may choose a member during the night to promote to Kingpin, killing all other Linchpins (this is not a visit and cannot be rbd or anything like that)
